org.apache.catalina

接口 LifecycleListener

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AprLifecycleListener, CometConnectionManagerValve, ContextConfig, EngineConfig, GlobalResourcesLifecycleListener, HeartbeatListener, HostConfig, JasperListener, JmxRemoteLifecycleListener, JreMemoryLeakPreventionListener, MapperListener, NamingContextListener, SecurityListener, SimpleTcpCluster, StandardEngine.AccessLogListener, ThreadLocalLeakPreventionListener, TldConfig, Tomcat.DefaultWebXmlListener, Tomcat.FixContextListener, UserConfig, VersionLoggerListener

    public interface LifecycleListener
    Interface defining a listener for significant events (including "component start" and "component stop" generated by a component that implements the Lifecycle interface. The listener will be fired after the associated state change has taken place.
    作者:
    Craig R. McClanahan

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void lifecycleEvent(LifecycleEvent event)
      Acknowledge the occurrence of the specified event.

    • 方法详细资料

      • lifecycleEvent

        void lifecycleEvent(LifecycleEvent event)
        Acknowledge the occurrence of the specified event.
        参数:
        event - LifecycleEvent that has occurred
